content: --अश्र, --अस्र {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (for अश्रि-स्रि) {1} four cornered, quadrangular; <ls>R. 6. 10.</ls> {2} symmetrical, regular or handsome in all parts; बभूव तस्याश्चतुरस्रशोभि वपुः <ls>Ku. 1. 32.</ls> (--श्रः, --स्रः {1} a square. {2} a quadrangular figure. {3} (in <ab>astr.</ab>) <ab>N.</ab> of the fourth and eighth lunar mansions.
